alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 13 at 3:49PM EDT until March 14 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, Storm surge combined with higher astronomical tides, and increasing wave action could produce localized minor flooding and splash around the time of high tide early Tuesday morning. For the Coastal Flood Watch, minor coastal flooding and splash over will be likely again at high tide Tuesday afternoon and early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 3 AM to 7 AM EDT Tuesday. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 PM 9.4 0.6 2.0 5 None 14/05 AM 10.9 2.1 2.6 6-8 None 14/05 PM 10.4 1.6 3.3 14-16 None 15/05 AM 10.8 2.0 2.8 10-12 None 15/06 PM 9.1 0.3 2.2 5-6 None 16/07 AM 10.8 2.0 2.5 3-4 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 PM 9.8 0.3 2.1 3-4 None 14/04 AM 11.2 1.7 2.6 6-8 Minor 14/05 PM 10.7 1.2 3.3 14-17 None 15/05 AM 11.5 2.0 3.0 11-12 Minor 15/06 PM 9.5 -0.0 2.3 3-4 None 16/06 AM 11.0 1.5 2.5 2 Minor Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 PM 10.2 0.5 1.8 1 None 14/04 AM 11.7 2.0 2.2 1 None 14/05 PM 11.2 1.5 3.1 1 None 15/05 AM 12.0 2.3 2.6 1 Minor 15/06 PM 9.8 0.1 1.9 1 None 16/06 AM 11.5 1.8 2.1 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
